shortDescription.default: This allows you run html or drop arbitrary script on a modern page.

longDescription.default: This web part is similar to the classic Script Editor Web Part, and allows you run html or drop arbitrary script on a modern page. By default this web part is allowed on no-script sites.

features.title: cibctoday-o365-modern-script-editor Feature
features.description: The feature that activates elements of the cibctoday-o365-modern-script-editor solution. This web part allows you run html or drop arbitrary script on a modern page.
